metadata.title: CVE-2023-2454 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: schema_element defeats protective search_path changes; It was found thatcertain database calls in PostgreSQL could permit an authed attacker withelevated database-level privileges to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: postgresql-9.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
postgresql-9.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
